revision.text:
==Note== These are base prices.
Items will increase in price when bought in bulk.
Most items will decrease with Pokémon's defeated with the exception of the [[masterball]] which will permanently increase in price on any purchase. ==Kanto: Locations and items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
